fields.Title of Presentation: Examination of Students’ Cognitive Proportional Reasoning Development in Relation to the Common Core State Standards
fields.Description/Abstract: Participants will have the opportunity to examine a trajectory of students' development of proportional reasoning through the use of assessment items and student work samples. They will then examine the CCSS for proportional reasoning and linear equations to situate the information about students’ development within the lens of the standards. The focus will be on grades 6-9.
